original_text: He placed forces in all the fortified cities of Judah and set garrisons in the land of Judah, and in the cities of Ephraim that Asa his father had captured.
korean_text: 유다 모든 견고한 성읍에 군대를 주둔시키고 또 유다 땅과 그의 아버지 아사가 정복한 에브라임 성읍들에 영문을 두었더라

sentences.original_text: He placed forces in all the fortified cities of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 유다의 모든 견고한 성읍에 군대를 주둔시켰다

sentences.original_text: and set garrisons in the land of Judah
and in the cities of Ephraim
that Asa his father had captured
